website_summaries.verdict: The best way to add a more expensive look at a budget price. Candle chandelier uses real candles for the authentic experience.
pros: Comes with replacement crystals in case some are lost or damaged when handling
cons: Luxurious touches look cheaply made up close

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Low pretty good after I added a lot more crystals to it. The crystals that come attached to it are NOT crystal or glass they are plastic. Arrived in a box with almost no packaging materials but it was not damaged except that I had to reattach some of the fake crystals. I added some remote control candles and it looks good in my Tiffany &Co inspired bathroom. Overall, it is not very big. It's more of an off white/cream color than it is pure white. *last photo (in front of window) is how it looked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kanina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chandelier for my outdoor gazebo. Something feminine but not expensive that could withstand some exposure to outdoor elements. This does the trick! I got the remote control battery candles for it, and they’re perfect! I wrapped the ends in tissue to make them fit tightly. I also ordered the acrylic crystal bead strands to give it some more flair. The strands were so easy to work with. Each bead is attached by a ring like a keychain, so it’s sinple to attach wherever you want more strands. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive look without the cost!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty... 2 of the "jewels" were detached, but went back on easily. I'm using this as part of my wedding decor. I will be hanging it from the center of an arch, & using flameless tapered candles....fist pic is actual product, second pic is the idea I'm aiming for... Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Crissylov

customer_reviews.title: Crooked - Poor Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the candle stems was severely bent, I tried to bend it back and was fearful it would break the weld, so I stuffed tissue inside the opening to try to balance the candle and somehow make it look balanced. The wire was irregular, so I stretched and bent to the best of my ability. Though it was low cost, for this amount of poor quality, it should have been cheaper. I took another person's idea and embellished it with more crystals. Too bad one prong was badly bend and others were repairable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with two crystal pieces missing from the box. One of the arms was bent from shipping which I fixed back. A couple pieces were uneven but you prob can’t tell from fr away. The color is an ivory creme which is nice for antique or shags chic farmhouse decor. Overall not built that sturdy but this is an inexpensive piece for decor only. I’m bummed I didn’t get the full display and had missing parts. Overall vaguely satisfied. Even though it’s a cheap make I knew I was buying, they could have made sure the hanging crystal pieces were accounted for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this to hang on the arbor for my wedding. It came in a timely manner, well made, everything came in tact (just two crystals slipped off but easy to put back on). I added more crystals to it to make it sparkle more. I loved it, worked perfectly good size above us as my husband and I said our vows. I love it so much I’ve decided to hang it over my garden tub and works with my French shabby chic decor in the bathroom. I would highly recommend this small but big statement chandelier, I might get another one to hang in my screened porch
customer_reviews.author: Deadlifts4Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but doesn’t hold candles very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go over my bed and it’s adorable! Currently, I have regular wax taper candles in each holder however they do not sit in their snuggly. I had to melt wax to pour into each holder and then stick the candles in them. I haven’t ever lit them since they are for decoration only. The color of the chandelier is an off white but you could very easily spray paint it any color you want once you take off the crystals!
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight it is which makes me more comfortable mounting it. You need to buy mounting hardware - go for like 2 inch long hooks and some anchors. I used two just in case one hook gives out. You also need to buy separate led candles that are remote controlled- amazon should recommend a brand
customer_reviews.author: Hiphopgroovy

customer_reviews.title: Took a little work to get it looking good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier. Had to re-attach some of the acrylic crystal dangles that came loose during shipment, but that wasn't a huge deal. My only complaint is that some of the metal arms were bent and un-even, which was a lot harder to fix than a few loose Crystals. You can't tell that the crystals are acrylic, not glass. Overall a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Buck

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: So cute! It feels sturdy for this price point. A few of the "jewels" were off when it arrived, but they were in the bottom of the box and easy to reapply. Like some of the other reviewers stated the candles do not fit well into the candleholder however a tip from another reviewer fixed that. Using a square of tissue takes up the slack and keeps the candles upright. I just put it up today but I love the look in person. It's perfect so far in my outdoor gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: MDMom

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the fake reviews. This flimsy cheap looking item is junk. It was carelessly packed, totally bent through the frame, the candle holders and the crystal branches.......it looked like a $7 piece of junk that hangs lopsided. The chain looks weak and will likely break. BUT, they were quick to refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: PLASTIC AND METAL BEAUTY
customer_reviews.text: I USED THIS FOR A BACKDROP DECOR AND IT WAS THE PERFECT SIZE. ITS NOT LARGE BUT LOOKS NICE OVER A CAKE, NOT OVERSTATED BUT IT IS SMALL/MEDIUM IN SIZE. BONUS IS THAT ITS LIGHT WIEGHT. YOU WILL NEED 5 CANDLES FOR THE CHANDELIER. I PURCHASED SOME BATTERY OPERATED ONES FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. A little small- but that's what I wanted. I put it in my bedroom above my bed. It really classed up the place :) Shipping was fast, nothing was broken. I really liked it. It was a bit of a struggle to find the right size candles to put in it. All the tapered candles I found were too long. I ended up finding 4 in tapered candles at Hobby Lobby on clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Domina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put over my corner whirlpool tub because putting an electric chandelier over a tub is not a good idea. I bought separately remote control candles for it. It is the perfect size with the right amount of elegance at a click of a button. Once I bought a ceiling hook and installed it the chandelier was up in seconds. ***TIP*** if you are buying remote control candles pick up a package of gorilla glue sticky pads (similar to fun tack) at home depot in the paint section
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It is a fancy fixture, but I have noticed that mine hangs a bit off-kilter. Happily it's only noticeable from certain angles. It isn't very heavy and hangs by a large hook.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in good condition. Had to bend the candleholders a bit to level them and had to put the jewels on. Of course, I had to bling it! I purchased additional crystals on Amazon and added them. I placed this above my tub and it’s stunning. I’m looking for another place to put one so I can purchase another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great for small room/ above the bed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small chandelier to put over my bed. I painted mine black and added one 16ft strand of crystals for maximum bling. I bought one inch led taper candles. Hangs with a twist hook I screwed into ceiling and it’s light weight enough to not need to screw into a wall stud. I had trouble finding. Shorter candles than 10” but they look fine.
customer_reviews.author: amber foster

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Very nice how it makes my small bathroom look elegant. Love this purchase and I’ve gotten a lot of compliments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: Chica Dulce’

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good with a few disappointments.
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is cute and will be a great background prop for photos. I had to purchase a metal ring to attach the crystals on the bottom that had fallen off. As my picture hopefully shows that bottom crystal was scraped and stained. The thing that I was really disappointed with is the chain. The description states that it’s 30 inches. It is 12 inches with a 4 inch hook. All in all though, for the money it will work for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! Love the color and design Lots of faux crystals in various shapes. My friend hung 3 in different lengths because she wanted a bigger display. I live in an apt and I have no where to hang an electric chandeliere
customer_reviews.author: elayne geiger

customer_reviews.title: These are locker lights. Not for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not come with a remote control. These “chandeliers” are just plain tacky and junky. Not appropriate for home- maybe a locker at a middle school. I’m extremely disappointed in the missing parts and pieces. I ordered two and I am out of luck and $60.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Charming and attractive addition to a decor.
customer_reviews.text: This small but cute chandelier is a nice addition to my outdoor pop up 10x10 canopy tent. Its crystals are plastic (which is a good thing because they are more lightweight and won't break) but look good. It's a charming chandelier and that people remarked about often, asking to purchase it sometimes even. I refer them to Amazon for those requests.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is small but absolutely beautiful. Used over a brides table and got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These were inexpensive and cute for my carport picnic shelter. I bought small fishbowls for a dollar each at the Dollar Store and glued them with E6000 epoxy to the candle holders to put little tea lights in them ....and they also look cute with water and flowers. The chains are pretty short so I used twine. I'm thinking about buying more. Great little chandeliers!
customer_reviews.author: anessa a.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chandelier! It’s perfect for my daughters room. So worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Small but definitely super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have this hanging over my corner tub in my bathroom, it is so cute. I wish it were a little bigger, but it definitely makes a statement when you walk into our master bathroom. I was afraid that the acrylic pendants would look really cheap, but I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Denise K

customer_reviews.title: Cute gor the price.
customer_reviews.text: Is cute for the price. I added more bling to look more expensive and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Ms, Menji

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews, I bought a chain of crystals online and blinged the chandelier a bit more. I could not be happier with this. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for an easy way to make a space look classy and chic!
customer_reviews.author: Kateri Bear

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Chandelier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the remote control but so chic & beautifully made. Looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I am so pleased with these. They are Georgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these for a wedding reception. They were a bit smaller than I thought they would be (yes the measurements are clearly marked), but ended up being the perfect size above covered 6' folding tables. I wanted them to hang lower so I bought some longer chain, and added battery powered tapers found on here as well. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, just stuck with only one size chain
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely and great for the price! Just wish the chain were a little longer and/or was adjustable or even that I could take it off and put a longer chain on.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier. I bought it to hang over my bathtub (and not have to worry about electric codes against electric chandeliers in a bathroom). The chandelier is very cute and is exactly what I wanted. I bought some little remote control taper candles to go with it and it looks great with the candles turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: Might be ok in a child's playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Unhappy with the quality and that I had to take a hit on return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Scott II

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and hung it outside in our gazebo without ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and hung it outside in our gazebo without candles, I get complimented on it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jac_Jac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent and out of shape.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but metal parts are bent so it does not sit even and can't re-bend to shape evenly, I need a refund or new one sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DIY to make it your own
customer_reviews.text: Missing 2 hanging crystals. I added crystals to the chandelier to make it bigger and dress it up. Saw a review that did this and wanted the same look. After doing that I loved the chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Celena Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad Such Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute, sturdy chandelier at a great price! Too bad it was so sloppily built; leaning and lopsided, unevenly spaced candle holders ruined the whole piece. If a little more care and time was spent on the manufacturing it could've been perfect. Sadly, I had to return it and was willing to try another one but the seller sent a refund.
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Honestly, better than I thought. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just as described and added just the right touch to a small area Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nm12

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting it to be a cute as the picture but it sure is. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Christinexoxodillon

customer_reviews.title: So charming for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lil chandelier if you want to add charm to A small room. I put this in my bathroom in less than 3 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Cute and dainty
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter's bedroom. It turned out too small for the big room so we put it over her bathroom vanity and it turned out beautifully. It's cute and shiny, and the right amount of bling for a young girl's room. FYI: This is not electrified! The only form of light this could produce is candle light!
customer_reviews.author: ATL_Prime_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Add some sparkle without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decorative chandelier to hang (without electricity) in my living room. This chandelier fit the bill perfectly. I added additional crystal strands for extra sparkle. I also used battery and remote operated candles. There were a few small scratches on the base of one of the candle holders. However, for the price, it was still a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: AlyHoff

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little chandelier. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because it is missing two dangling jewels. I would very much like them sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight design for girls room
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something lightweight and elegant for daughter's room...it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: ITS OK BUT PRODUCT COME BENT IN PLACES
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WAS OK BUT IT COMES BENT IN THE CANDLE SECTION HAD TO TRY AND FORCE OUT TOO MUCH WORK. BUT IT IS LIGHT WEIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, for the price, I thought it would be pretty janky, but it's perfect! The color is exactly as shown so there's no surprises, and the crystals are lovely. I hung it above my bath and I am so, so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Have this hanging up in my office. Everyone compliments it and asks where we got it. I put glass candle holders in it that I got from a thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: jeff cook

customer_reviews.title: Check your measurements first to ensure the right size you want.
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than what I would like to have. It is small and cute. I recommend that one verify your measurement first. It looks small on my wedding ceremony arch. But that is my issue. I would recommend this one for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: mosesisgreen

customer_reviews.title: Cute chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. It's a little dinky and arrived with some of the jewels unattached. It was easily fixed though. It's also a little bent but not noticeable. The most frustrating part was that I bought 5" taper candles but they're too small and don't really fit so I had to melt them into place. Overall the product is good (especially for the price). I hung it over my bathtub for better candlelight ambiance. It's perfect! Dainty and small but not tiny (actually larger than I thought). I'm also glad it's not terribly heavy since it'll be hanging over my head!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but very cute
customer_reviews.text: Product is very cute. However, it’s smaller than I had thought. I added some extra beads to it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: It is going in my tiny house and I am super excited!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! It is going in my tiny house and I am super excited!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in good condition. For the price you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest chandelier. Going to use at my booth display and it's just the right size. Arrived in good condition. For the price you can't go wrong. No issues with the "crystals" coming off during shipping. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very shabby chic
customer_reviews.text: It is so beautiful in person, going for a shabby chic theme and this just compliments the room.
customer_reviews.author: gladys

customer_reviews.title: awesome chandelier awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this chandelier. It so pretty especially for the money. I purchased some battery operated candle lights that's for perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value. I used this for a cake setting.
customer_reviews.author: Ale Salinas

customer_reviews.title: If you’re really into shabby chic, this may be for you.
customer_reviews.text: A too shabby and not chic enough for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Metz

customer_reviews.title: Missing jewel
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier was going to be used for wedding but it came with a missing jewel
customer_reviews.author: Hayle

customer_reviews.title: now it's looking better, but there is definitely a little bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: looks kind of cheap. I took off the diamonds, spray painted the chandelier chrome (silver) and re attached all of the diamonds, now it's looking better, but there is definitely a little bit of a cheap aspect to it.
customer_reviews.author: VV2019

customer_reviews.title: Great chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It goes perfect over my bathtub!! Has to straighten out the candle holders a bit, otherwise it’s a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. de Rios

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Used 5 of these over the cake table at my daughter’s wedding. So beautiful! Lightweight and easy to hang. Had to buy lights and batteries separately but was very pleased with the turnout.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Just had to be adjusted because some of the metal was uneven.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: I added some remote LED candles and they look like real electric chandeliers with no electrical wiring needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to put behind my bed and they are gorgeous! I added some remote LED candles and they look like real electric chandeliers with no electrical wiring needed.
customer_reviews.author: StarGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn’t come with candles.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Just need to find candles to fit with remote control.
customer_reviews.author: TRA

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Very cheaply made. Packaging was terrible and it was bent in places.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Miranda-Soto

customer_reviews.title: Ivory Baroque Candle Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a baby girl's nursery or bedroom. It is lighter than it appears, and because the crystals are acrylic you don't have to worry about them falling off and breaking. I used pink candles to match the color in the nursery and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Wrenne

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: cute and small good for a little girls room...the metal bends easily tho so be careful manipulating it.
customer_reviews.author: Leighanne55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for added ambiance in my master bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful results for the money. Bought the taper candles with the remote and the rubber taper/votive candle holders so the candles would fit and stand upright. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria. Argenal

customer_reviews.title: did not come as the image depicts. couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: did not come as the image depicts. couple of jewels are missing and the paint job is sloppy. and it is lopsided. =/
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my "Hen Hilton"
customer_reviews.text: Hung this in our new Chicken Coop nicknamed "The Hen Hilton"
customer_reviews.author: mjb

customer_reviews.title: I used the battery powered remote candles and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really cute design. The metal isn't cheaply done but the crystals are definitely light plastic. You can't really tell when it's hung. I used the battery powered remote candles and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mount

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Looks beautiful! Used in the center of our arch in our wedding along with led candle sticks. Now I will use in our home! Probably too small for a table chandelier but would look nice over a accent table or small room
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Von Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful I have it hanging in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chandelier that was prettier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chandelier that was prettier than I expected! But you WILL NEED help assembling it. One of my chandeliers came in the mail broken and they issued a full refund without any trouble. I'm very happy with the product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fanatic

customer_reviews.title: great price! I ended up adding more crystals to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for, great price! I ended up adding more crystals to it. (Not pictured) Very happy with my purchase, may get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Rozier

customer_reviews.title: The perfect touch!
customer_reviews.text: This addition to my bedroom is spectacular! Dazzling really... made well and looks stunning. The perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: special
customer_reviews.text: We are having a Mardi Gras party in our small development and I just wanted small inexpensive candle chandeliers for the occasion. They are perfect for our porch and I'm sure will be the talk of the night.
customer_reviews.author: sailoxford51

customer_reviews.title: So Cute! Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute to fancy up an outside event. Also bought the battery operated clip on candle lights which work perfectly with this chandelier.. Love it ! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to complete my daughter's Paris theamed room decor. Good for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chandelier
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and perfect for an outdoor wedding ceremony.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but very pretty for wedding!
customer_reviews.author: debbieshiver

customer_reviews.title: beautiful can't decide where to put it
customer_reviews.text: beautiful can't decide where to put it. was going to put it in my bedroom but now thinking it would be nice on the patio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to use. I paired with some battery operated candles and added some ambiance to my bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh This is the best thing that i have bought on Amazon. i love this so much.good quality. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered a second of this. But I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a second of this. But I did not give it a five because two of the hanging crystals are not included. And no, I did not throw them out in the shipping materials, I searched everywhere
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for the center of our gazebo and it arrived on time. It's really pretty and looks great inside the gazebo! I am really happy with this chandelier!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is so pretty. I hung it in my daughters nursery to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty. I hung it in my daughters nursery to be used as soft light in the evenings. II out remote controlled candles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Harris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: There was a chip in paint. I filled it in with white craft paint. I havent paid much attention to the crystals-they are plastic), they are all there, i think...... I'm sure the little girl that I bought it for will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my bedroom that has no ceiling fixtures. Lightweight and looks beautiful. It was the perfect touch to a bedroom I had no idea what to do with. I will be getting at least one more for my daughter's room if not one for her play room as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately quality is not too great and one of the piece was received broken. Not a good experience
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory for my bathroom - the "crystals" look amazingly ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice accessory for my bathroom - the "crystals" look amazingly real. The attached chain and hook could have been better quality, but overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: harborjules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Chic, light weight, right size and perfect price for my Daughter's wedding outside. We are going to hang it between to trees draped with sheer curtains. A nice simple back drop. It arrived 2 days after we ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my patio over my table! I added the battery operated candles with the remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but you will have to fix. I bought 3...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the mini candle chandeliers. I did buy 3 but they came bent, two crystals on each chandelier was broken and I had to Re-bend the twisty metal back to it's original look. By doing that I noticed that I slightly cracked the paint.. I have them put up on my house and they look amazing but I did have to go to Michaels Craft Store and purchases a few things to fix theses.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So sweet perfect for my salon to ad a little bling without having to ad electrical.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Barrett

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful however I am just now getting ready to hang ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful however I am just now getting ready to hang it and I see that two of the prysims are missing on the upper arms of the chandelier? Can I get them sent to me? Thanks Al
customer_reviews.author: alfred r lebel

customer_reviews.title: I was able to use it but the pictures do ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use it but the pictures do show a more exquisite detail than real life. So I wasn’t able to use it where I originally bought it for but I did use it in a space at home.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not very good, candles won't stand up, not made very well. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: m j young

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike, it was just like I expected and even better.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Escalante

product_meta.title: Gifts & Decor Ivory Baroque Candle Chandelier, Iron and Acrylic
product_meta.description: Curlicues, crystals and candles galore - this wonderful chandelier has it all. A lovely touch of luxury and refinement for your dining area, foyer, or even outdoors. Holds four taper candles. Hanging chain included. Weight: 1.8-pound. 11-inch by 11-inch by 15-inch high; 30-inch long with chain. Iron and acrylic. Candles not included.
feature_bullets: Made from Iron and acrylic and includes a hanging chain
Elegant curlicues and accented with acrylic crystals
Measure 11 inches x 11 inches x 15 inches high
Adds a luxurious touch to any interior decor
